name: Google SERP + AI Search Scraper
description: Scrape Google SERPs with AI Overview text using real mobile IPs. Returns titles, URLs, snippets, positions.
longDescription: Scrape Google search results including AI Overviews through real 4G/5G mobile proxies. Bypasses datacenter IP blocks and CAPTCHAs. Returns structured JSON with titles, URLs, snippets, position ranking, and extracted AI Overview content. Supports multiple result pages, country/language targeting, and optional browser-rendered AI overview extraction for JavaScript-heavy content.
features: Structured JSON output (title, url, snippet, position)
Multi-page support (up to 5 pages per request)
